item.title: Grid Snapping Problem/Bug
item.author: invalid@example.com (divineStorm^)
item.dc:creator: divineStorm^
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone! ;D

I'm making map DM-UrbanDeadline which is a Sniper-gamestyle dark urban map. But into the problem->

I have the building all set. Now I added stairs, the stairs were hard to set because I needed to put my Grid to 1 or 2 to get them in position. OTherwise, they would have gone wrong/not in grid.

Then I was subtracting a whole building height and about 1/8 of the buildings size cube so I can put a mover in there. When I tried to position it, it just doesnt hit the grid,...

Grid Snapping Problem/Bug

item.title: Mesh Formats Imports Walruses
item.author: invalid@example.com (KurtonTheMagician)
item.dc:creator: KurtonTheMagician
item.content:encoded:
I'm posting this from a Mac, miles away from the nearest UnrealEd.exe, and I want to ask this.

Can UnrealEd import mesh formats like 3DS or OBJ into the editor?

If not, is there anything I can use to convert said whatevers to T3D?

item.title: Unreal engine 2 or 3?
item.author: invalid@example.com (GoAt)
item.dc:creator: GoAt
item.content:encoded:
9 years after my first frag in UT, the itch to learn the editor must now be scratched.

Now, i have a very extensive tutorial on the editor that comes with 2k3. Would it be best to learn that before moving to what comes with UT3?
I also have some very basic knowledge on the original editor.

(since i know this will be asked)
The maps are going to be exported to 3ds max for use in another game.

item.title: Assault bot pathing, help!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dale2)
item.dc:creator: Dale2
item.content:encoded:
So, I just finished new assault map for UT99.It is very big map with helicopters.Now I have some troubles with bots pathing.
Because map is very big I put the path nodes by hands.Very simple. So bots routes have minimum variants, only streight path.
As so as: player start - several path nodes - lift exit - lift center - lift exit - several path nodes (about 40) - Fortstandart.
For defenders it is more simple: player start - path nodes - defense point near Fortstandart.
So, I see the...

Assault bot pathing, help!

item.title: Disappearing Terrain
item.author: invalid@example.com (pseudosafari)
item.dc:creator: pseudosafari
item.content:encoded:
Hi.
I've nearly finished a Chizra-styled temple map for UT2k4 but after zoning I've found a problem with my terrain. In all the zones where the terrain occurs or is visible from I set bTerrainZone = True under the ZoneInfo, but when moving through from the main outside area to a hallway that shows a smaller section of the terrain I have problems. When viewing the terrain from a zone I set up beneath the entranceway to the hall the terrain appears entirely black as if no lighting has been...

Disappearing Terrain

item.title: All map editors read here
item.author: invalid@example.com (SWIFT_DEATH)
item.dc:creator: SWIFT_DEATH
item.content:encoded:
Wanna increase you texture selection. Harry Potter & the Sorcerer's Stone the game, uses the same engine as unreal tournament. Even though the game is crappy, buy it, and move the huge texture selection into the Unreal Tournament texture files. It has the same folder setup, so you wont be confused. The Harry Potter textures are awsome for any map creation. It has some really beautiful textures, like exotic rugs, stone walls, cool looking bookshelves, much more. So for any mapper with...

All map editors read here

item.title: TriggerControl?! Why won't it close?
item.author: invalid@example.com (pseudosafari)
item.dc:creator: pseudosafari
item.content:encoded:
Hi
I'm having some trouble with the TriggerControl feature of movers in Ut2k4. I'm trying to have mechanical barriers rise up out of the ground when a player sits in (or stands near) an ONS turret (I used a playerproximity trigger with a radius same as turret) and goes down when the player leaves.

When the player leaves the turret the movers go back down as long as they haven't all reached their final Open keys, but when the player stays in the trigger zone long enough for them to...

TriggerControl?! Why won't it close?

item.title: DOM point problem
item.author: invalid@example.com (bobnine)
item.dc:creator: bobnine
item.content:encoded:
Im making a DOM map for UT2004. Domination point A is directly above B on a seperate floor. Whenever I rebuild all the editor moves B to a different place, and gives an error saying "This type of navigation point cannot be based on Scout20". It only does this when the A is above B.
Am I not aloud to have one domination point above the other?

item.title: Slowdown and Staticmeshes
item.author: invalid@example.com (pseudosafari)
item.dc:creator: pseudosafari
item.content:encoded: I'm currently making a map (about DM-Asbestos size) where I want to line the walls on the lower levels with 3d bamboo. My approach so far has been to place individual bamboo stems along the walls but already the FPS in my map is dropping. Is there a way that I can still have a 3d wall texture and somehow reduce this slowdown?
